fields_of_interest: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Transport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Finabel is mainly interested in the Common Security and Defence Policy, EU-NATO relations, Foreign Affairs, Terrorism and the Permanent Structured Cooperation.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Transnational associations and networks of public regional or other sub-national authorities
relevant_communication: The Finabel activities cover the publications of researches  and papers, hosting meetings with the Chiefs of Staff of the land forces  from the Member States, and organise project groups regarding military interoperability.
goals__remit: The Finabel coordination committee is an organisation comprised of 22 member states of the European Union to promote interoperability between its members.
